name: tribal-craft
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for traditional Indian tribal crafts

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix tribalcraft-backend && npm install --prefix tribalcraft-frontend
scripts.build: npm install --prefix tribalcraft-frontend && npm run build --prefix tribalcraft-frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix tribalcraft-backend" "npm start --prefix tribalcraft-frontend"
scripts.build-frontend: npm install --prefix tribalcraft-frontend && npm run build --prefix tribalcraft-frontend
